meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of xylography.
meanings.sent1: The xylographical tools were used to create intricate designs on wooden blocks.
meanings.sent2: The artist's xylographical skills were evident in the detailed woodcut print.
meanings.sent3: The xylographical patterns on the door gave it a unique and artistic touch.
meanings.sent4: Her xylographical talent carved stories into the ancient oak.
meanings.sent5: The xylographical artistry of the craftsman brought life to the plain timber.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to wood engraving.
meanings.sent1: The xylographical techniques involved carving intricate designs on wooden surfaces.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed a collection of xylographical prints from the 18th century.
meanings.sent3: The xylographical mistake turned the tree trunk into a work of art.
meanings.sent4: His xylographical precision transformed the plain wood into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The xylographical beauty of the forest was captured in the artist's engravings.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the art of engraving on wood.
meanings.sent1: The xylographical process involved carving images onto wooden blocks.
meanings.sent2: The xylographical workshop offered classes on traditional woodcut techniques.
meanings.sent3: The xylographical mishap turned the table into a piece of art.
meanings.sent4: Her xylographical creations adorned the walls of the gallery.
meanings.sent5: The xylographical details on the furniture added a touch of elegance to the room.
